page.title: 17LOCAL SUPERNATURAL TALES
page.content: LIKE MOST ISOLATED RURAL AREAS,THE MISTY MARSHLAND AROUND ACLE,WITH ITS FLICKERING WILL-O-THE-WISPS AND HAUNTING BIRD CALLS,TENDS TO MAKE THE IMAGINATION RUN RIOT, PARTICULARLY ON DARK MOONLESS NIGHTS. FROM THE HUNDREDS OF LOCAL SUPER- NATURAL STORIES, WE HAVE CHOSEN THREE WELL- KNOWN TALES THAT HAVE SCARED CHILDREN FOR GENERATIONS.{ {BLACK SHUCK THE MARSHES AROUND ACLE ARE SUPPOSEDLY HAUNTED BY A PHANTOM DEVIL-DOG CALLED BLACK SHUCK.HE IS REPORTED TO BE THE SIZE OF A LARGE MASTIFF,BUT WITH LUMINOUS RED EYES AND A SLAVERING TOOTH-FILLED MAUL.IN SOME PARTS OF NORFOLK TO SEE SHUCK IS SUPPOSED TO BRING BAD FORTUNE OR EVEN DEATH,BUT AROUND ACLE HE WAS OCCASIONALLY REPORTED TO HAVE LED PEOPLE TO SAFETY ACROSS THE MARSHES.
